Reviews.Title: Great Cables
Reviews.Author: T. Lamphere
Reviews.Content: The purchase of these cables went off without a hitch.  The shipping was quick and it was packaged appropriately.  I just wish the cables themselves were a little thicker gauge.  But, all in all thanks and I'll be back.

Reviews.Title: HIgh Quality Wire
Reviews.Author: Casteela
Reviews.Content: This wire comes in 4 150ft packs with adapters that allows you to plug in to other sections of wire or directly to the unit your setting up. Good quality wire.

Reviews.Title: OK...but not great quality
Reviews.Author: Luis Jaramillo
Reviews.Content: I already had 4 cameras and had already bought cables for them.  When I added 4 more cameras, I saw these and thought they were so cheap.  Well...the quality is also cheap.  The camera views on the monitor are so different quality from my other cameras.  The picture is grainy!!!  But, if you want to buy inexpensive, this will do the trick.  Cost is wonderful....just not the quality.  I did not find out until I had them installed otherwise I would return them.

Reviews.Title: 4 Pack
Reviews.Author: William J. Whelan "60's revolutionary"
Reviews.Content: This is a great addition to the Swann DVR 8...it allows me to cover the extra areas of my property no problem.

Reviews.Title: extra cables.
Reviews.Author: Raymond W. Leung "rwleung98"
Reviews.Content: I got them because the ones that came with the OEM were too short. It worked great and I have couple of spares for replacement if needed.

Reviews.Title: Why wire went bad!
Reviews.Author: Carlos Berio
Reviews.Content: one wire is not working properly, video side went bad. I can't take it down, too much work, should had never gone bad. it is only 2 month old!

Reviews.Title: product
Reviews.Author: Kevin Templeton
Reviews.Content: love it  this product is just as presented on Ebay. I own rental property so items like this is needed.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: steve szabo
Reviews.Content: These worked great with my Defender system and they were more then i needed. But it's better to have more then not enough.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Sean Tracey
Reviews.Content: Very thin wire.  Interference is caused by the connectors being loose, so make sure they are tight, and the connectors are not near an interference source (Electrical cables or the like)  This cable is working very well with my camera system.  I have color/night vision cameras and the quaility is equal to the factory cables that came with the system.  I will buy more of these.  Again, if you see color lines in your video, check that the connector is tight and away from out side interference.  (I ran this cable in a 1" PVC pipe, to protect it from mice, and outdoor elements - 1" is the minimum for the end to go into a corner piece)

Reviews.Title: Content
Reviews.Author: Bill G
Reviews.Content: Item received was exactly as described by the Vendor.  It shipped immediately in the appropriate packaging.  I have not installed as yet but have no doubts this is exactly what I required.

Reviews.Title: power supply
Reviews.Author: sc
Reviews.Content: great service. I love my new power suplly cables, it works perfect. would recommend this merchangt to any one!!! i would definitely do business with them again.thanks

Reviews.Title: good item
Reviews.Author: giorgiohiro
Reviews.Content: exactly what i ordered very pleased quick delivery ... ...... thank you guys great product to use with a surveillance camera that i bought from amazom as well

Reviews.Title: Excellent Service
Reviews.Author: Mel - Trini
Reviews.Content: These cables are excellent.  Just as described.  The service from the company was exceptional.  We received one short and they send the other one speedily, so we could have continued our installation without hicups.

Reviews.Title: Tangled Mess
Reviews.Author: Adergador
Reviews.Content: Don't get me wrong. These cables are a great deal, but only buy these if you have hours of spare time to untangle them. They are wrapped doubled over, so when you take off the zip ties they instantly turn into a bird's nest that takes at least an hour per cable to untangle. A simple solution for the company would be to wrap these onto a plastic spool. If that would have been the case I would have definitely given them a 5 star rating.

Reviews.Title: lots of wire
Reviews.Author: bonnie ayres
Reviews.Content: there was a lot that came with the camera so I didn't need them but we go another camera so we used one of the wires. it was long and works great.

Reviews.Title: Would not work
Reviews.Author: Bobby
Reviews.Content: i tryed, but i think because of the length and the gauge of the wire, that it simply would not work. i would ask for a refund but i had to cut the wire to get it back out of my house

Reviews.Title: excellent product at an exceptional price!
Reviews.Author: ejl3839
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this product because I believe in the brand and the quality. Trust me, it has definitely lived up to expectations and would do business again!

Reviews.Title: Wire size
Reviews.Author: Joe McPherson
Reviews.Content: The information in add didnot state wire size. For the length the wire was to small for my cameras, there fore I could not use the wire.

Reviews.Title: Maybe to thin?  Maybe doesn't work in the cold?
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I had two cable runs longer than the 50' runs that came with my system.  Ran these two to their respective locations and after about a month the first one failed.  Thought it was the camera, nope, it is the cable.  Then 5 months later the second one failed.  I looked at the stock cable and these together and these are a lot thinner.  Yes that's right, thinner isn't always better.  Or maybe the second one had 'shrinkage' due to the cold and the copper isn't connecting?  I don't know if this is more pertinent to the length or a common issue for all VideoSecu cables, but I think this is one of my first one-start ratings I've provided.  Now what to do with the non-working cables…. Maybe I can knit a funky faux leather scarf?  Maybe I can make a giant trip wire in front of our house for giggles on Halloween… oh wait, my camera there doesn't work (because the cable doesn't work) so I can't record a funny YouTube video that would go viral.  To the landfill they must go!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Mark Boisvert
Reviews.Content: No issues and they work very well. I have some of these out doors and they still work great. I will buy more...

Reviews.Title: liked them but I returned them
Reviews.Author: New Favorite
Reviews.Content: The Camera setup had to be returned so I sent back the cables too. I don't know what other systems will require

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Evilstalkerhorne
Reviews.Content: Great product! I use these all the time as I set up systems. Always a good picture and if you have to splice them as I do heat tape and seamless tape work well. Weather resistant and fast shipping!

Reviews.Title: Works nicely, but I wonder?
Reviews.Author: David S Creech
Reviews.Content: I wonder if the people who package it, said "let's tangle this up so it takes an hour to get the wire straight", before they can install.

Reviews.Title: great product, good price
Reviews.Author: carol
Reviews.Content: worked as expected wish camera systems came with these cables fast shipping very easy to install more than enough cable to go around my house

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu 4 Pack 150 Feet
Reviews.Author: Sigh
Reviews.Content: VideoS 4pack If pulled to tight didnt seem to tight the wire can brake/tare/ripp in half and did it once my cams black out have to unplug-replugin.out of five cams two cams used this wire wierd both were out but it could of been the plug there on there own plug.

Reviews.Title: Worked flawlessly.
Reviews.Author: James Munn "J.E.M."
Reviews.Content: Purchased these to stretch out to my barn.  Fit flawlessly to my SVAT system.  They do what they are suppose to do.  The wire is a bit thinner than the stock cables, but I buried them in a pvc pipe so that should not be an issue.  Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: Good Cable!
Reviews.Author: crobin1
Reviews.Content: Long run of 150' but still good quality video. The only reason it's not getting a five is because the cable was folded in half and then looped. This made unwrapping the cable very difficult. Other than that, good cable for the money.

Reviews.Title: As good as the cables that came with my system
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: They're just as good as the cables that came with my Q-see system and work just fine. No quality loss on any of the cameras so I don't know what those other few reviewers were having issues with.

Reviews.Title: well made
Reviews.Author: R. Scott
Reviews.Content: good quality cable with well made connections on each end ... 150' but if you pay attention to way it was wrapped you can unwind and control it ok.

Reviews.Title: cost effective
Reviews.Author: tomi c.
Reviews.Content: Ordered as extra lengths for CCTV.  No loss of video on longer leads, but as others have noted, they can be a real pain to unwind.

Reviews.Title: a Must have with my system.
Reviews.Author: K. Colvin
Reviews.Content: I needed to get these cables to complete my installation. I bougth the 60 ft but was not enough long.

Reviews.Title: Gives you longer reach for your cameras
Reviews.Author: bloodshot23 "Aaron Glenn Campbell"
Reviews.Content: Work as advertised. Needed longer cables to run from the DVR to the cameras.. replaced the stock cables that came with the surveillance system.

Reviews.Title: Directions for unspooling
Reviews.Author: D. Kelly
Reviews.Content: Because both ends are spooled together, rather than starting at one end and ending at the other, you need to unspool before use or you get a big knot.  Here's how to unspool:1. put a "stick" or pole through the center (I actually used a long drill bit)2. unspool a little and put a weight on it (i used a box of supplies, but you could have someone hold the ends, but this just keeps it in place and puts tension on the cable)3. walk backwards making a circular motion to have the cable unspool off of the "stick"  (holding both ends of the "stick", push down and away from you, then roll up and around toward you...that sort of circle)Given the length you may need to put another weight and circle back and forth near the same area.You might have a few stops to release a cable from the "stick" that got tangled, but it's incredibly easier than trying to just unspool the bundle.I haven't been able to test the cable yet.  I'm waiting for the house to get done, but it should do the job.

Reviews.Title: Great cabling though - way the wires are wrapped makes it a mess to install
Reviews.Author: M. Jones
Reviews.Content: Cabling was great.  But the wires are wound such that the dvr and and camera end are bundled together.  This makes it a real pain to use because it will become a twisted tangled mess as soon as you start to unwind it.  The best method I found was to unwind it outside on the floor unrolling is so the two wires are laid down.  Next you have to pick one end and then manually unwind it from the other end as you spool it up.  Its a real pain to work with this cabling.  Most people probably want to fish the dvr end through a hole and have all the other cable - camera end all spooled up.  This cable is just not going to help you at all in this regard its a major pain.  It would help alot if the supplier either spooled it so the two end strands where not intertwined - or provided some kind of plastic widget thing to make unwinding less of a pain.  Just be prepared to be doing a lot of spaghetti unwinding with this cables which will add a lot of time to your camera wiring job.  Would have given it 5 stars if the cable winding made more sense.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy With My Purchase
Reviews.Author: Barbara A. Fike
Reviews.Content: These cables was exactly what I needed. Ran them through pvc pipe & put them underground. Haven't had a problem yet. I had no problems with tangles because I put a round pipe through the center hole and pulled it off like a spool. Worked great. I would reccommend these to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Cable
Reviews.Author: MWCraft
Reviews.Content: I bought this at the same time as my Swann SWDVK-825504 system since I did not know how long a cable run I would need to install my cameras.  Fortunately, these cables were more than enough for my home and the distance from camera to DVR.These have performed reliably for me (in the 2 1/2 months I have had them) and I would buy them and from the seller again.

Reviews.Title: they work great
Reviews.Author: butterfly
Reviews.Content: My cords got mess up ..I try different places trying to get replacement cords ..I even drive over 26 miles to get replacement cord .I went on line to  Amazon founded the cords for about the half the cost. They are longer ,thicker and work great. Item I would tell you to try.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: C. L. Akers
Reviews.Content: Hard to beat the price. It might look 'thin' but it holds up well !! Dragged it all over the roofs.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Kevin Crook
Reviews.Content: way better pricing than any of the retail stores around. They do tangle a little easy but that is on the user. They function perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Paint TV....
Reviews.Author: Myron Layton
Reviews.Content: We got the camera setup to monitor three pregnant mares at our barn. It has been the most wonderful thing to be able to watch them from wherever we are, the app works on computers and smartphones so we had a chance to share our experience with friends and family. What a treat this camera system is, pretty easy installation, a little complicated getting it online, but we made it with some tech help and my brilliant daughter!! Would buy from this company again in a heartbeat, and we got our whole birthing of colts and phillies on tape and shared with all who had the app!! Love it!

Reviews.Title: love em
Reviews.Author: Powerstrokin
Reviews.Content: wow are they long very thin wire but video quality is fine had them for a year now no problems

Reviews.Title: Adequate for its job
Reviews.Author: Morgan Harris
Reviews.Content: I got this to run my cable outside.  works just fine with no problems.  twice as long as the ones provided by Swann in the kit.

Reviews.Title: cable works fine but adepters are not fit~
Reviews.Author: Oldtime Runner
Reviews.Content: BCN adepters come with but should be female to female.I tried to connect with other same cable that connect was not fit.company should send with female to female adepters also.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: alalake
Reviews.Content: was exactly what i wanted, fast and good and i liked it . am i done yet: three more words.

Reviews.Title: Wires!!
Reviews.Author: Danny J. Morton Jr.
Reviews.Content: WHEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE *gets tangled in wires* oh boy , I feel like a kitten lol all jokes aside , these wires are awsome for my ghost hunting needs , in some cases i have to use some equiptment which requires wires to run , its all good has only 2 same adapter and yet I would also suggest getting a roller for these cause they do get tangled easy if not kept organized

Reviews.Title: Tough and easily managed
Reviews.Author: DrP
Reviews.Content: Excellent workmanship on the cables.  The outer insulator could use a slightly tougher shell, but overall these have stood up to pulling, stretching, and tension around rafters and studs.  For the toughness they do have, the cables have a nice hand (soft and flexible) even at 40-degree temperatures.

Reviews.Title: Long and sturdy
Reviews.Author: latunatexx
Reviews.Content: Could use labeling on ends, one for camera end, and one for DVR end. They should also figure out a better way of wraping these up. It's a pain in the ass to unwind them

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Cables, Very Thin Though!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: All cables came working and without any flaws, they all worked and haven't had a problem with them. The only "bad" thing about these cables is that they are VERY THIN compared to the camera cables you get when you buy a camera/dvr system (The Swann 4 camera system I bought had much thicker, more sturdy cables). They all work great, but any animal or sharp corner will cut these cables for sure. I don't advise getting these IF YOUR CABLES ARE EXPOSED OUTSIDE. My cables however are immediately running into the house from the cameras, so not even an inch of cable is showing outside, therefore the thin cables aren't a problem for me. If you can be careful while running these cables and not end up cutting or splitting them, they work great! The video quality is the same for me as the cables that came with my system, so the thin-ness of these doesn't affect qulaity at all, you just have to be careful while running them. As with all camera cables (not just this brand), the point where they split into power and video at both ends WILL SPLIT VERYYYY EASILY...I suggest putting electrical tape around these points on each end of your cables before running them to prevent accidental damage (I split one of the 4 cables I had while simply unwinding the cable from the plastic spool they came on, they are that easy to split so follow this suggestion unless you want faulty cables!) I highly reccomend these cables if you are ok with them being a little thinner than standard camera cables, but with the same great quality.

Reviews.Title: Solid Product
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: I am new to the land of video surveillance equip. But these extra long cables came in handy in a few places since the zmodo set i ordered had only 60 ft ones. Not the most heavy duty cables- just basic. if you crimp them under a ceiling tile or the like, they wont work. The power cords dont match up with the zmodo perfectly. The VideoSecu ones have slightly longer male ends to the RCA connectors than the zmodo female ends. BUt they did work perfectly. So all was well.Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Would not replace malfunctioning cable
Reviews.Author: Parag Doshi "Dr. D."
Reviews.Content: 3 cables worked fine.1 cable did not and the company tried to say it was my fault and that I did not notify them within 30 days. However, my project started 2 months after receiving the cables.The seller would not agree to refund any amount.  After much disagreement the seller only agreed to have me ship back the cables at my cost and would charge a 15% restocking fee. This would basically make the effort impractical as the cost of shipping plus restocking fee would make a near break-even situation. The issue was not caused by me, but the seller does not stand by his/her quality and then agree to replace at their cost.  I suffered many hours just debugging whether it was my camera, or DVR connection, or something else that was malfunctioning.  I finally had to go out and buy another cable to narrow the problem down to the malfunctioning cable. Seller has no concern over my wasted effort.

Reviews.Title: They was not 150 feet they was 96 feet
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: i chose the 150 feet as we have a bog property but when we start it was no way this is 150 each we measure each one they was 96 feet only that is very bad business to advertise 150 feet and it is less than 100 feet this is not good at all now we have to wait until we got more cables

Reviews.Title: Basic cables
Reviews.Author: Jason Duffey
Reviews.Content: The cables arrived on time, work, and fulfilled a need. Nothing very special just cables. Sorry I cant be more colorful but it was a simple purchase.

Reviews.Title: If like untangling wire this is for you
Reviews.Author: Zbeydoun "Zach Beydoun"
Reviews.Content: Cable comes tangled up and I sent 4 hours untangleing it. it is low gauge and rips easy. spend a little extra money and save your self the time

Reviews.Title: Cable is good, BNC connectors are not
Reviews.Author: Will Tracy
Reviews.Content: The male BNC connectors that attach to the female lugs are misaligned. The male coupling fits over the female connector with no problem and the 1/4 turn secures the cable. However, when you try to remove the BNC, the left 1/4 turn does not align with the female lugs and instead of a smooth, quick release, the connector had to be moved up and down and to the side and pulled out with some force. I have never had this problem with the thousands of BNC connectors I have used over the years. Just these.

Reviews.Title: missing parts
Reviews.Author: BF5
Reviews.Content: Missing 3 units.  only 1 of 4 pack was received.  I'm not sure how to report the issue.VideoSecu 4 Pack 150 Feet Video Power CCTV Security Camera Cables with BNC to RCA Adapter Connector 1OA

Reviews.Title: never got to use them
Reviews.Author: bob e dulin
Reviews.Content: bought these to replace cables a squirl had chewed into put 8 new cables on yesterday squirl chewed all 8 cables again got to kill some befor i try again but i like amazon and the service you provide

Reviews.Title: over 500 dollars and half the cameras are not working from day 1
Reviews.Author: Linda Patterson
Reviews.Content: So we pay this price an put up this system.  Understand the cameras are mounted high for security......boom the first day 4 of the cameras which work well during the day, do not work at night........the images are so fuzzy you cannot discern anything.......so I call the Swann company and get a hold of a young man who is called Josh.........and they want me to climb up high.......take down one camera that is not working........bring it down and somehow retrieve the power supply for it, which is under my house and test the camera individually.......this after we have tried the different power supplies with it and tried all the other ports in the back.........it is only these 4 cameras that do not work, yet I have to do all this?  Why not let me return 4 cameras and send me 4 that work?  I would not buy this product again

ProductInfo.Features:
Plug and Play ready
All-in-one video and power cable
4 x 150 feet video/power cables in black
Output type BNC video connector & 2.1mm power connectors
For DC power only
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Pack 150 Feet Video Power CCTV Security Camera Cables with BNC to RCA Adapter Connector 1OA
